predicate.note: Frames file for 'venerate' based on sentences in ectb2. Based on entry for 'admire'. Verbnet entry 31.2, other members include admire, adore, cherish, distrust, envy, favor, grudge, loathe, pity, relish, savor, tolerate, value, and worship. Framenet entry Judgement.
